backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor managing photos, albums, user profiles, access control, and upload operations, with caption-ready photo type and helper functions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old photo records to new format by adding a caption field initialized to null.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries for all frontend source files and checkpoint documents.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme rules for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point wiring the app root and including the generated old‑camera favicon.
frontend/PHOTO_APP_STAGE_2_ALBUMS.checkp: Checkpoint documentation describing completion of the Albums feature and its backend integration.
frontend/PHOTO_APP_STAGE_3_SEARCH.checkp: Checkpoint document outlining completed search, caption, and favicon features with technical details.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile loading, and conditional rendering of HomeScreen or SignInScreen.
frontend/src/components/AlbumActionsDial: Modal for creating, renaming, or deleting an album using mutation hooks with pending state handling.
frontend/src/components/AlbumCard.tsx: Displays an album preview card with cover photo and photo count, loading the cover via a query.
frontend/src/components/AlbumCoverPhotoD: Dialog to choose and set an album's cover photo, fetching paginated photos and submitting the selection.
frontend/src/components/AlbumPhotoGridIt: Grid item for an album photo with hover-to-remove button and click handler.
frontend/src/components/PendingUploadPre: Shows thumbnails of pending uploads with options to remove individual items or clear all.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGrid.tsx: Renders a responsive grid of photos where each item triggers a click callback with its index.
frontend/src/components/PhotoPickerDialo: Dialog for selecting photos from the library to add to an album, using paginated fetch and multi-select.
frontend/src/components/PhotoViewer.tsx: Fullscreen photo viewer with navigation, caption editing, and photo deletion support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal prompting user for their name and saving the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/UploadButton.tsx: File upload button managing previews, progress, and batch photo upload using useUploadPhotos.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for profiles, photos, albums, and mutations interacting with the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light and dark color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers around the app.
frontend/src/screens/AlbumDetailScreen.t: Album detail view showing album info, photos, actions, pagination, and photo viewer dialogs.
frontend/src/screens/AlbumsScreen.tsx: Displays album list with search filtering, allows creating albums, and navigates to album details.
frontend/src/screens/HomeScreen.tsx: Shows photo library with search, pagination, uploads, tab switching, and full-screen viewing.
frontend/src/screens/SignInScreen.tsx: Provides a simple Internet Identity sign‑in UI with loading state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, existing features, and architectural notes for the Photo Library app.
